name: Territory War Online
summary:
Defend your turf! They think they can take over your land? They have another thing coming...

A throwback to classic games such as Worms and Scorched Earth, this turn-based battle game is off the chain; unleash ballistic destruction upon the invaders and shed no tears as they burst into dust.

Test your skills online in this multiplayer edition -- Can you be the top dog? Jump online with your XGen account, or hit quickstart for instant action.
